thread.title_full: 'Stranger Things' Kids Freaked Out More Than Anyone Over Season 2 Teaser

author: Bill Bradley
title: 'Stranger Things' Kids Freaked Out More Than Anyone Over Season 2 Teaser
text:
'Stranger Things' Kids Freaked Out More Than Anyone Over Season 2 Teaser And you thought you were excited. 02/06/2017 10:01 am ET Bill Bradley Entertainment Editor, The Huffington Post Phillip Faraone via Getty Images 
Winona Ryder‚Äôs facial expressions at the SAG Awards were nice ‚Äî well, they were amazing ‚Äî but, still, her reaction doesn‚Äôt come close to her ‚ÄúStranger Things‚Äù co-stars watching their Super Bowl commercial . 
Netflix unveiled a new ‚Äú Stranger Things ‚Äù teaser trailer during the game on Sunday, and the kids from the series seemed to have a viewing party. But they were not ready. A video posted by üåçNoah Schnappüé• (@noahschnapp) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:47pm PST 
Following the teaser, Noah Schnapp, who plays Will Byers on the show, shared the video, which appears to show him freaking out along with castmates Finn Wolfhard, who plays Mike, and Gaten Matarazzo , aka Dustin. 
These kids must‚Äôve been spending a lot of time in Mirkwood, because taking a page out of ‚Äú Lord of the Rings ,‚Äù their reaction was the one to rule them all. 
Keep working at it, Winona. Maybe next time.
